name: nonrelative
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who is not a member of your family: The document must be witnessed by a non-relative. The children were cared for by nonrelatives.
More examplesFewer examplesOnly five percent of the country's older people live alone or with nonrelatives.Social workers try to place children with members of their extended family before they turn to non-relatives.
judged or measured without making comparisons with other things: I have a notion of truth as being singular and non-relative. Philosophers have argued about whether non-relative knowledge is possible.
More examplesFewer examplesDo you believe that there are any real non-relative objects in the world?
